info.summary: Fast, modern and advanced photo management suite
info.description:
# Memories: Photo Management for Nextcloud
Memories is a *batteries-included* photo management solution for Nextcloud with advanced features including:
- **📸 Timeline**: Sort photos and videos by date taken, parsed from Exif data. - **⏪ Rewind**: Jump to any time in the past instantly and relive your memories. - **🤖 AI Tagging**: Group photos by people and objects, powered by [recognize](https://github.com/nextcloud/recognize) and [facerecognition](https://github.com/matiasdelellis/facerecognition). - **🖼️ Albums**: Create albums to group photos and videos together. Then share these albums with others. - **🫱🏻‍🫲🏻 External Sharing**: Share photos and videos with people outside of your Nextcloud instance. - **📱 Mobile Support**: Work from any device, of any shape and size through the web app. - **✏️ Edit Metadata**: Edit dates and other metadata on photos quickly and in bulk. - **📦 Archive**: Store photos you don't want to see in your timeline in a separate folder. - **📹 Video Transcoding**: Transcode videos and use HLS for maximal performance. - **🗺️ Map**: View your photos on a map, tagged with accurate reverse geocoding. - **📦 Migration**: Migrate easily from Nextcloud Photos and Google Takeout. - **⚡️ Performance**: Do all this very fast.
## 🚀 Installation
1. Install the app from the Nextcloud app store (try a demo [here](https://demo.memories.gallery/apps/memories/)). 1. Perform the recommended [configuration steps](https://memories.gallery/config/). 1. Run `php occ memories:index` to generate metadata indices for existing photos. 1. Open the 📷 Memories app in Nextcloud and set the directory containing your photos.
